summary:
I have over 7 years of experience working in buying and merchandising for infants wear & kids wear (junior boys and junior girls) with Landmark Group (Easybuy). 

My strengths lie in my passion for understanding what customers like and what's popular in the market. I pay close attention to small details, which helps me choose the right products that people will love, leading to increased sales. I am good at negotiations, curating high quality range/ merchandise in affordable and competitive prices, analyzing data and making data-driven decisions to maximize profitability.

I am an honest, passionate and dedicated professional, approaching my work with genuine enthusiasm. I take pride in making quick decisions while paying attention to the finest details. My creativity, can-do attitude, and strong connections with others make collaborating with me a delightful experience. Beyond my professional achievements, I believe my positive attitude, warm and welcoming smile uplifts the work environment, spreading joy among my teammates. I am a quick learner, always eager to expand my knowledge, and continuously improving myself, contributing to the growth of the team and projects. My standout leadership qualities and willingness to lend a helping hand make me a cherished colleague and a valuable asset to any organization.

school.name: Maharaja Ranjit Singh Punjab Technical University

awards.title: Best Category Award- Kids and infants wear
awards.description: Best category for year 2021-2022 with highest STR and LFL.

awards.title: Certificate of Recognition- iLEAD
awards.description: Value certificate presented to me as I was value champ for showcasing the value of "Deliver". Best deliveries for infants wear in the fiscal year 2019-2020.

profile_positions.description:
•	Finalizing product range. 
•	Major Project- "Core tees"; Successful launch of core T- shirts for junior girls. 
•	Meeting with suppliers and closing profitable deals for the brand.
•	Assessing sales performance of different ranges.
•	Weekly sales/Stock on hand(SOH)/Production status review with team.
•	Preparing Master file and capacity mapping for vendor.
•	Regular market survey to analyze market trends, product strengthening and optimizing MRPs.
•	Purchase negotiations and finalizing product cost.
•	Managing budgets and achieving margins.
•	Supervising and training junior staff right from receiving tech-packs to on-time delivery.
•	Liaison with marketing team to ensure photoshoots and campaigns are aligned with our collections.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Manager- Buyer- Kids wear - Girls

profile_positions.description:
•	Worked as a buyer, merchandiser and designer for infantswear category to plan product range.
•	Major Project- Successful launch of "Character merchandise" in the stores.
•	Minor Project- Revamping trims like main label and main tag for infantswear category for brand enhancement.
•	Opportunity buying and converting the same into designs as per the market trends.
•	Monitoring sell-through of products on a weekly basis and taking corrective actions by analyzing the trend.
•	Preparing order sheets and master file.
•	Managing budget and achieving margins.
•	Product costing and negotiations.
•	Negotiating quantities and delivery timescales.
•	Regular market survey and competitor analysis.
•	Supervising and training junior merchant and designer; right from receiving correct tech-packs to on time delivery.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Manager- Buyer and Merchandiser- Infant's wear

profile_positions.description:
•	Worked as a merchandiser and designer for infants wear category to plan product range.
•	Major Project- Successful launch of Rompers for new born.
•	Worked together with the technicians in order to achieve desired fit of products.
•	Prepared order sheets and shared the same with vendors as per the vendor's expertise.
•	Regular market survey and competitor analysis.
•	Follow up with suppliers and monitoring the process from lab dips to bulk delivery for ensuring deliveries are met with a high product quality
•	Resolving supply and production problems by reacting to supplier queries on an ad hoc basis.
•	Sample management (Proto, FIT, PP, GPT, photoshoot) and control.
•	Negotiating quantities and delivery timescales.
profile_positions.title: Sr.Executive-Buyer and Merchandiser- Infant's wear

profile_positions.description:
•	Worked closely with planners and designers to plan product range.
•	Major Project- Successful launch of "Glow in the dark" collection.
•	Follow up with suppliers and monitoring the process from lab dips to bulk delivery for ensuring deliveries are met with a high product quality
•	Resolving supply and production problems by reacting to supplier queries on an ad hoc basis.
•	Sample management(Proto, fit, PP, GPT, Photoshoot) and control.
•	Negotiating quantities and delivery timescales.
•	Raising orders and providing POs to suppliers as per the timeline given in buying calendar.
profile_positions.title: Executive-Buyer and Merchandiser- Kidswear

profile_positions.description:
•	Product development and cost negotiation with clients like Lifestyle, Myntra and Aditya Birla group.
•	Lab dip, trims, bulk fabric colour and quality submission to the buyer for approval.
•	Proto/ fit/ PP/ GPT sample submission to the buyer and arranging approval for bulk production.
•	Coordinating with various departments like yarn manufacturers, dyeing, knitting, production, finishing and packing to deliver the stock on time to client.
•	Preparing time and action plan and updating the same to buyers.
•	Independently handling the production line of 100+ workers.
•	Collecting inventory report from the store.
•	Regularly updating production status to the quality team and buyers.
•	Sending the required materials (trims, fabric, etc.) for third-party test and provide the report to the client.
•	Regular checks with the factory's quality department in order to improve the workmanship skills of the factory workers.
•	Making schedule for inspection with the quality assurance team.
•	Ensuring on-time and seamless shipment to the buyer.
•	Follow up for payments from the client.
•	New product development.
profile_positions.title: Merchandiser- Apparels
